short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search on howlongtobeat.com for highlighted text by right clicking

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This convenient extension enhances your browsing experience by adding a HowLongToBeat.com search option to your right-click menu. This works on every website.

If you come across a game and want to find out how long it takes to beat, simply highlight the game's name, right click, and select "Search HowLongToBeat.com for <Your text>" from the menu.

The search results will open in a new tab, giving you quick access to valuable information about game lengths, playtimes, and more.
